title: The Usborne Illustrated Dictionary of Maths (gnv64)
description:
The Usborne Illustrated Dictionary of Maths
by Kirsteen Rogers and Tori Large
Usborne Pub Ltd | January 2010 | ISBN-10: 0794521436 | scanned PDF | 135 pages | 15.5 mb

Discusses terms and concepts dealing with numbers, calculations, plane and solid geometry, graphing, algebra, trigonometry and vectors. Age Range: 9 and up
